page.title: 06COCKFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Cockfield Voluntary Controlled Primary School.It is a first school for children aged 4 to 9 years of age.There are 63 children here this term.The school has 11 governors now but up to this year, there were 6.Children come here from the villages of Cockfield and Thorpe Morieux and a few children come from Bradfield St.Clare.The school is open from 9a.m.to 3.20p.m..We have a break for dinner from 12 to 1.15p.m.From this school,children go on to Beyton Middle School and then at 13 years of age,they move to Thurston Upper School.Some children go from here to St.James Middle School in Bury St.Edmunds.In our school there are 3 classes,one for 1st and 2nd year children,one for 3rd years and one for the 4th and 5th years.There is a headmaster,two other full-time teachers and a part-time one for music.
